mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MOVIE_RESERVATION ( MOVIE_CHECK_TIME, MOVIE_SEQ MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_THEATER, MOVIE_DIMENSION, MOVIE_TIME, MOVIE_PERCENT REG_ID, REG_DT, CHG_ID, CHG_DT ) VALUES ( #{movie_check_time}, (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(A.SEQ),0)+1 FROM MOVIE_RESERVATION A WHERE A.MOVIE_CHECK_TIME = #{movie_check_time}), #{movie_title}, #{movie_theater}, #{movie_dimension}, #{movie_time}, #{movie_percent} #{reg_id}, SYSDATE(), #{reg_id}, SYSDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT MOVIE_CHECK_TIME, MOVIE_SEQ MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_THEATER, MOVIE_DIMENSION, MOVIE_TIME, MOVIE_PERCENT REG_ID, REG_DT, CHG_ID, CHG_DT FROM MOVIE_RESERVATION WHERE MOVIE_CHECK_TIME = #{movie_check_time} ORDER BY movie_seq
